executive_summary: Alternative healthcare treatments have increasingly become part of mainstream medical care. While many alternative approaches lack conclusive scientific research, more consumers are interested in supplementing or substituting traditional healthcare to treat common conditions or improve their overall well-being. An opioid epidemic has also pushed more people to uptake alternative care methods as a safe and effective option.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Consumers' Interest in Alternative Healthcare Reaches a New Height
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Alternative healthcare isn't anything new, but fast-growing spending on complementary approaches showcases a greater acceptance of them than ever before. What's behind this rising spending varies by specialty, but demographics, income growth and consumer trends are primary drivers.
A growing population of adults 65 and over has supported the uptake of complementary medicines to address issues like pain management, mobility and well-being.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Social Media Trends Introduce a New Era of Wellness
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: A conclusive body of medical research supporting the efficacy of alternative healthcare remains lacking.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Insurers' Acceptance of Some Alternative Approaches Expands
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Most health plans still don't fully cover alternative healthcare providers, but some insurers have begun adding alternative providers into their networks.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Telehealth Augments the Role of Alternative Providers
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Telehealth adoption surged during the pandemic as a way for patients to safely connect with healthcare providers.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Companies will benefit from the increased focus on prevention and wellness services as part of essential health benefits state-by-state.
Medical schools have integrated alternative medicine into their curriculums.
Over the next decade, the number of adults over 65 is expected to continue outpacing growth in the overall population.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Advancements In Technology Transforming Healthcare Delivery
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Improvements in AI and machine learning technologies are expected to revolutionize patient care and diagnostics.

industry_definition: This industry provides health services not classified in any other industry, like meditation, acupuncture or massage.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level: Low - Increasing

opportunities: Number of people with private health insurance
threats: Federal funding for Medicare and Medicaid

key_trends: Alternative healthcare often operates outside of mainstream medical practices.
Research supports some alternative approaches more than others.
More adults than ever are engaging with alternative healthcare therapies.

market_segmentation.segment_description: More teenagers and children are being introduced to alternative healthcare to support their well-being.
Adults aged 18 to 44 are the largest users of alternative healthcare providers.
Adults aged 44 to 64 are also frequent users of alternative healthcare providers.
Adults aged 65 and over utilize alternative healthcare providers the least.

products_and_services.product_description: Acupuncture is a traditional Chinese medical practice.
Massage therapy is a hands-on treatment.
Naturopathy is a system of healthcare.
Meditation involves a trained instructor guiding.

tier_1_suppliers: Medical Supplies Wholesaling in the US
Drug, Cosmetic & Toiletry Wholesaling in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Most private insurers don't cover alternative healthcare
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Most private insurers don't cover alternative healthcare.

business_locations.location_description: The West contains many alternative healthcare providers.
This region's dense population attracts alternative healthcare providers.

regulations_points.regulation_title: The Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
regulations_points.regulation_description: Alternative healthcare providers must follow HIPAA regulations.

regulations_points.regulation_title: ANTI-KICKBACK STATUTE AND PHYSICIAN SELF-REFERRAL LAWS
regulations_points.regulation_description: Prohibits exchange of anything of value to induce referrals.
Alternative healthcare providers must fulfill state requirements.

barriers_points.barrier_description: No national standards oversee alternative healthcare providers.
New providers don't face substantial start-up costs.
Providers differentiate by operating outside of traditional healthcare.

basis_points.basis_description: A strong reputation lends credibility to the provider.

concentration_points.concentration_description: Many providers operate solo or in small practices.
Independent practitioners struggle to integrate with others.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Hiring Challenges Haven't Translated into Wage Growth
Alternative Healthcare Providers Balance Rising Purchase Costs with Profitability
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Providers depend heavily on supplies to ensure quality care.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Inflation's Impact Slows Down Profit Growth
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Profit growth will slow in 2024 due to inflation.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Challenges for alternative providers due to inconsistent insurance coverage.

volatility_points.volatility_title: An Uneven Regulatory Landscape Creates Volatility
volatility_points.volatility_description: A loose regulatory environment can create uncertainty.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: VIRTUAL SESSIONS HAVE A LIMITED ROLE FOR ALTERNATIVE HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Some studios offered virtual sessions during the pandemic.

FAQs.question: How do you identify and target potential customers to expand your customer base and increase revenue?
FAQs.answer: The text does not provide any specific information on how to identify and target potential customers.

FAQs.question: What is the Anti-Kickback Statute and Physician Self-Referral Laws?
FAQs.answer: Prohibits exchanging anything of value to induce referrals.

FAQs.question: What are the state licensing requirements for alternative healthcare providers?
FAQs.answer: Many states don't require practitioners to receive a license.

FAQs.question: What assistance does the industry receive?
What is the American Holistic Health Association (AHHA)?
FAQs.answer: AHHA is a non-profit organization promoting holistic and integrative approaches.
